name: Fundatia ADEPT Transilvania
goal:
Conservation of High Nature Value farmed landscapes in Romania, and support of the rural communities within them.
Includes conservation actions, farm advisory services, research and policy advocacy
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy
Rural Development Programmes especially agri-environmnent schemes
Natura 2000 and Birds and Habitats Directives
